data.column.name: exp.year
description: year when restoration technique or experiment started

data.column.name: paradigm
description: restoration paradigm adopted, either active or passive

data.column.name: measure.success
description: measure of success considered by authors

data.column.name: ntotalsamples
description: total number of samples in the study

data.column.name: var.t
description: measure of variance of experimental treatment

data.column.name: var.c
description: measure of variance of experimental control

data.column.name: measure.dispersion
description: measure of dispersion used in each study, standard deviation, std error

data.column.name: MAP (mean anual precipitation)
description: mean anual precipitation of the study site

data.column.name: aridity.index
description: aridity value of the study site

data.column.name: potential.evaporation (mm)
description: potential evaporation value (in mm) of the study sites
